This application was created as a bridge between the user and the IoT. Its main purpose is to give the user access to various functions available through connection with aspberryPi. The main function is to browse the scripts available for execution and run them remotely with one click. The script will be executed by the RPi and the result of the script will be returned to the user\'s screen. Information about errors appearing during the task execution will also be returned.
